about.title: About me
about.paragraph1:
A frontend developer with 
a strong understanding in both technology and business.
Specialized in React and Next.js,
I build intuitive, user-centered web services
backed by diverse technical experience.
about.paragraph2:
With experience in multinational teams
and fluency in Korean, English, and Japanese,
I can effectively address both business
and user needs on a global scale.

subTask: Led frontend & UI/UX renewal of Cafe24 referral plugin 'Incento' with 10 multinational team members
Planned and redesigned the Incent admin site to improve usability and operational efficiency
Designed business logic and improved service architecture based on user needs
Built responsive web design optimized for various devices
Improved data visualization and clarity through intuitive dashboards and simplified workflows
Developed reusable component architecture using  Next.js with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
Optimized styling using Tailwind CSS with consistent design system
Visualized dashboard data using Chart.js and nivo
Managed data with PostgreSQL and handled secure files with AWS S3/CloudFront
Deployed stable, scalable infrastructure using Vercel
Developed cryptocurrency asset management service 'CryptoTax' using Spring MVC and Tomcat
Managed data using MySQL, MongoDB, and MyBatis
Integrated APIs from major cryptocurrency exchanges and implemented backend logic
Developed user-friendly views using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery
Built a multilingual website using i18n and translated the Korean version into English
Operated secure, efficient file storage and deployment using AWS S3/CloudFront
Designed mobile UX/UI flows using Figma
Created UX design maps and wireframes for services like pet hospitals, hotels, stores, and pools
Built websites and booking systems using HTML5, CSS, and Spring MVC
Delivered optimized UI across various devices through responsive design
Designed and implemented system and mapping structure for linking membership data across services
